website_summaries.verdict: A fun, brightly colored comforter set for the Mickey Mouse or Disney World lover.
pros: Available in full and twin sizes
cons: Occasional owner complaints about material quality and durability

customer_reviews.title: Very bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Shipped quickly! Vivid colors. My grandkids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice comforter however I had to mend it right out ...
customer_reviews.text: My son (2) has autism and he loves mickey mouse. It's really the only thing that calms him. When I saw the comforter set I just knew it would make his day. Today was the day I got to see his face light up when he opened his package. It is a nice comforter however I had to mend it right out of the package. I wasn't expecting for the price that I would have to fix a seam. None the less he didn't notice and didn't care now he is snug with his "hotdogs".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart! Don't waste ur $$!! Not well made:/
customer_reviews.text: Giving this item a two star because it's made poorly. After one single wash my son's bedding is already coming apart. It doesn't hold well around the corners of his bed at all. We constantly have to fix it:(. Disappointed because our 2 yr autistic son loves mickey mouse and he just got this for his birthday. Going to have to look for other options I guess. Not like he's a big boy and is moving around a lot in his sleep. He just turned two and is under 30 pounds. Don't waste your money would be my advice.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal L

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Mickey Mouse so we did his room in Mickey theme when we moved. And he loved seeing Mickey on his new bed! Arrived early and was in good condtion.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, poor quality, too small
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product as a birthday gift for our son. The fitted sheet is supposed to fit a full size bed. Not only does the fitted-sheet not fit my sons bed (doesn’t cover mattress, continually comes off), it is poor quality, rough and thin to the touch. The comforter does not reach across the bed either. I would not recommend spending money on this set as it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E

customer_reviews.title: Cheap comforter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loved it. The colors are very vibrant. But when I first washed the comforter it tore around the edges. The second timed i washed it it tore even more. I have a small washing machine so it's not like the comforter moved a lot during the cycle like it normally would. The pillow case and fitted sheet are good but the comforter was cheaply made. Not worth 50 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mykonos

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Mouse!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bedding set! It’s brightly colored and works well for my busy toddler. My only struggle is that I wish the fitted shreet was bigger. We have under the sheet bumpers to prevent him from falling out of bed and it’s hard to place those under the sheets and have the sheets fit properly. But we make it work.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Better than so-so
customer_reviews.text: The comforter has held up nicely after being washed a handful of times. The sheets are thin and not very good quality. They have runs in the fabric after only purchasing them a month or so ago. Update: 12/8/2018 My son still loves this Mickey set and the comforter and sheets has held up after multiple washes (my son is 3 years). I do not regret purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: SLP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bright vivid colors! A tad expensive
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my toddlers room. It is really bright and brings lots of character to the room. It is a bit big because he still uses a crib mattress . We got the 3 in one crib. So far my 3 year old likes it! The price was above what I was willing to pay but I got it because it matches the decor in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 year old loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Only complaint is that the sheet slips off the corner of the bed and needs to be fixed almost every day. Not a big deal, just a little annoying. My 2.5 year old didn't care and loves his Mickey begging so not enough to take away a star.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McElfresh

customer_reviews.title: Thin comforter but my son still likes it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and my son loves it but I wish the comforter was more thick, it's quite thin for a comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffykc07

customer_reviews.title: Comforter the size of a duvet
customer_reviews.text: The double sized bottom sheet (no top sheet) is flimsy and slippery. I was disappointed in the quality. The comforter is great but is actually the size of a duvet. Pillowcases are wonderful but also a bit slippery. Does NOT interfere with usage. I am using another bottom sheet but love the duvet and pillowcases.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Fairclough

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and very cute. Not the best quality, but just ok, and the color is bright and exactly as pictured. Love it! If you are thinking about it, I say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Missing Flat Sheet
customer_reviews.text: Musing flat sheet. Didn't read the details stating no flat sheet Previously when ordering bedding combos it has always included a fitted and flat sheet.
customer_reviews.author: TwinTechMom

customer_reviews.title: Could be thicker
customer_reviews.text: Over all my son loves it and thats all that matters to me but the comforter could be thicker other then that no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Win for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my toddler to transition to his "big boy" bed. He loves it and has showed it off to everyone. Helped remove any fear of moving to a new bed and changed it to excitement.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Metter

customer_reviews.title: WINNER
customer_reviews.text: i Had a little problem at 1st. I was missing the shame. Seller did good. Sent me another one.I'm happy and my grandson happy. Loves his Mickey big boy bed.
customer_reviews.author: lisa streep

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sons room and when it arrived I was very happy with it. However, after a few months the corner of the sheets came unsewn and then a month later the comforter did the same. The quality of this set did not live up to my standards for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Mickey
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very soft material. Look fantastic in my son's bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super cute and the sheet fabric is very soft. The comforter is a little flimsy, so I don’t know how long they will last us, but other than that very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: sahin cetindere

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully
customer_reviews.text: Read carefully, has a complete set but missing the FLAT sheet. Bought for Christmas (which I do early and unable To do anything with that one piece missing.)
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Very bright vibrant colours. It's only drawback was being polyester, but it still felt nice
customer_reviews.author: Aziza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bedding
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 1/2 yr old and he was so excited to see Mickey on his “big boy bed”. It’s beautiful. The blanket is very warm. So if you run hot maybe not the blanket for you. But I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Akers

customer_reviews.title: Full size is not big enough to cover both sides of a full mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson's room and for full sized bed. It is too small, does not cover both sides of matress. If you are purchasing for a full you might want to order a queen.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A.

customer_reviews.title: My famili
customer_reviews.text: Thank you amazon my baby like so much I like this produck from amazon is the best
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Sleepy time
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Mickey Mouse and he loves his bed now that mickeys on it
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Quality not equal to cost.
customer_reviews.text: Child’s bed , very light weight flimsy material. For a comforter that cost that much I was disappointed. Looks like a sheet in his bed. I expected a heavier comforter that stayed in place. Had I have opted for a 25$ set, I would expect this look.
customer_reviews.author: Clair Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality stitching and feel apart after the first cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Chad Thomas

customer_reviews.title: definition- comforter set
customer_reviews.text: when you here comforter set you assume : 1 pillow case 1 fitted sheet 1 comforter 1 top sheet not in this case no top sheet. You have no choice but to sleep under the comforter. Shame on me for assuming definitions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The cover and the pillow cases are great the sheet not so much. The sheet slides off it’s kind of silky but not good silk.
customer_reviews.author: P. Blount

customer_reviews.title: Great set, washed well. Wish it was cotton
customer_reviews.text: I would like them to get made out of organic cotton. The material doesn't feel right for bed sheets however it is widely used. Otherwise great set
customer_reviews.author: Tania Gueorguieva

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bedroom Addition
customer_reviews.text: Son loves, but would of been better to some with a sheet as well. Material does appear to be a good quality and holds color after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Octavius J.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My little one completely moved into his bedroom after this adquisición... he is completely in love with his bed covers.
customer_reviews.author: Jakeline Saldana

customer_reviews.title: Percect
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it so much it so soft and good material I loved it so much
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product my son loves it and it was great in cold nights
customer_reviews.author: Lebogang Bassie

customer_reviews.title: SHEETS DONT FIT!!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter and pillow cases are fine but the bed sheet does NOT fit a full size bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Clair

customer_reviews.title: Sean ripped after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Super cute comforter but after the first wash the seam came apart about 4 inches of it.
customer_reviews.author: Scanlon Family

customer_reviews.title: Should include a top sheet for the price
customer_reviews.text: A top sheet is not offered, that's ridiculous. Colors are bright and comforter is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it! Mostly because it has Mickey on it. But it covers his bed nicely and keep him warm.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfy comforter. No top sheet and sheets may not last long.
customer_reviews.author: LaQuondra

customer_reviews.title: Mickey Mouse fan
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had two pillowcases. But it is very vibrant and fits his bed well. Love the design.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaM

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I dislike is there no coming with sheets
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Landa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Comforter started to come apart after one wash, and sheets snagged.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Nussbaum

customer_reviews.title: I don’t have a complete set in my order
customer_reviews.text: I only receive two items it was supposed to be 4 items
customer_reviews.author: Mike peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my g-son who is such a mickey mouse nut.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Flat Sheet
customer_reviews.text: No flat top sheet. Very odd. Wish I’d read the fine print.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Melanie Weir

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son LOVES it!! The quality is really good!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca cloutier

customer_reviews.title: No flat sheet !
customer_reviews.text: Disapointed a flat sheet was not included. I just assumed it was in the “set”.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pyzynski

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old grandson loves this bedding set. ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson loves this bedding set. He was so excited that helped me make the bed and then asked me to take his picture. He is a huge Mickey Mouse fan. The colors are vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: The quality and material is perfect for my son's full size bed
customer_reviews.text: The quality and material is perfect for my son's full size bed. It keeps him warm, it's not stiff like some comforters and I can wash it in my extra large cspacity washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: STACEY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my money
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute, my son loves it. However after first wash the seams melted leaving it feeling crunchy like they used plastic on the seams. I used cold water and always dry on low/delicate. Second wash the colors have started to bleed and more melting around the seams. I'm not happy with this purchase, but my son is oblivious so it's serving its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...son loves it. Would have been nice if it came with a top sheet. For the price, it should have included that. Comforter is nice and not super heavy or really light. Has lasted through a few washes now and so far so good 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Krislea

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great item goes on the bed perfectly don’t need any straps it’s not too big or too small fits perfectly great for kids that love Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.author: Aris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and bright. Very soft and cuddly blanket set. my son loves it and brings his mickey mouse to sleep in their mickey bedding every night. Super satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is good quality, having looked it over as I am saving for a Christmas present. For the money I feel it should also include a flat sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Beautiful Item
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item for a child's bed. Love the vivid colors and was a perfect fit for the bed. Washed and it retained its color. My child loves it!
customer_reviews.author: nubianmba

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the price. My 6 year old loves it. The comforter is lightweight and perfect for the summer. The colors are very nice, just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: E. Just

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: It's too expensive and I feel if you pay the price the quality should be great. The comforter is not thick it's very thin for winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Arslan

customer_reviews.title: Should be a complete set(5) pieces
customer_reviews.text: Comforter set in a bag always comes with a sheet, beside that my 3 year old loves his Mickey Mouse comforter
customer_reviews.author: C. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loves it and I'm pleased with how soft it is
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our baby's first birthday. He absolutely loves it and I'm pleased with how soft it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lankey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: decent quality for the price. I'd buy again. My 2 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TXMama

customer_reviews.title: Cute for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Not a heavy comforter, more like a spring/summer blanket. Cute and colorful for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and colors are nice and brought. Foster son LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My son can't go to bed without it. It's the only blanket he keeps on.
customer_reviews.author: LILLIAN JONES

customer_reviews.title: No sheet
customer_reviews.text: I knew it didn’t have a sheet but just strange it doesn’t come with a sheet in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: he just love Mickey
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson was so surprised, he just love Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it... I bought it as a birthday present for my nephew (who is 1 years old) He absolutely loved it.... I bought the full size
customer_reviews.author: clysh

customer_reviews.title: A+, would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it!, colours are very vibrant, light weight, but warm, and delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Calce-Polk

customer_reviews.title: Not top quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a top sheet & it tore a little during the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: chris beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves his new bedding
customer_reviews.text: For my grandsons bedroom . Looks great and good quality. Price was a little more than I had hope to spend but, this pattern seems to be in high demand.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I loved it ! I bought it for my son for his twin size bed . It fit perfectly! It is sealed and the right size .
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 3 years old grandson. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: di1277

customer_reviews.title: NOT cotton sheets, poor quality, no top sheet, horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: The moment you open the package, the room with fill with the foul stench of "China". My kid broke out with excema like nothing we've ever seen because these aren't cotton sheets - they are 100% polyester. Hard, crunchy, thin, low quality, and smell like a trash fire. Oh, and there's no top sheet, so be prepared to provide your own top sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: Disney Mickey Oh Boy! Gosh Licensed Full Comforter Set w/Fitted Sheet
product_meta.description: Disney Mickey Oh Boy! Gosh juvenile Full bedding comforter set. Comforter set includes 1 comforter, 1 fitted sheet, 2 standard pillowcases; comforter 76-inch by 86-inch, fitted sheet 54-inch by 75-inch, standard pillowcases 20-inch by 30-inch; Comforter set fabric content: 100-percent polyester; Washing instructions: machine wash in cold water, tumble dry low;
feature_bullets: Comforter set includes 1 comforter, 1 fitted sheet, 2 standard pillowcases
Comforter 76-inch by 86-inch, fitted sheet 54-inch by 75-inch, standard pillowcases 20-inch by 30-inch
Washing instructions: machine wash in cold water, tumble dry low

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars335 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
